column1: YETO Sources Universe Master â€” PRODUCTION READY v2.3 (Importer + Endpoints + Products)
v2.3 adds two operational one-to-many sheets:
- SOURCE_ENDPOINTS: multiple endpoints per src_id (API bases, SDMX flows, RSS feeds, PDF directories).
- SOURCE_PRODUCTS: datasets/reports/newsfeeds per src_id; used to drive ingestion planning and UI linking.
- Current importer ONLY consumes SECTOR_CODEBOOK_16, SOURCES_MASTER_EXT, SOURCE_SECTOR_MATRIX_292.
- Manus should upgrade importer to also ingest SOURCE_ENDPOINTS and SOURCE_PRODUCTS into new tables.
